Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.service.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
Manages game levels, including level selection, unlocking, and speed calculations. Handles all level-related logic separately from UI concerns.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentLevel

      public int getCurrentLevel()
      Gets the current level.
      Returns:
      The current level (1-6)

    • setCurrentLevel

      public void setCurrentLevel(int level)
      Sets the current level.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to set (1-6)

    • resetToFirstLevel

      public void resetToFirstLevel()
      Resets to Level 1 (for new game).

    • calculateSpeed

      public int calculateSpeed(int currentScore)
      Calculates the game speed for the current level. For Final level (6), speed is dynamically calculated based on score.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - The current game score
      Returns:
      The speed in milliseconds

    • checkAndUnlockLevel

      public boolean checkAndUnlockLevel(int score)
      Checks if a level should be unlocked based on score and unlocks it.
      Parameters:
      score - The current score
      Returns:
      true if a new level was unlocked, false otherwise

    • isFinalLevel

      public boolean isFinalLevel()
      Checks if the current level is the Final level and needs dynamic speed updates.
      Returns:
      true if current level is Final level (6)

    • getUnlockedLevels

      public boolean[] getUnlockedLevels()
      Gets the unlocked status of all levels.
      Returns:
      Array of booleans indicating which levels are unlocked

    • isLevelUnlocked

      public boolean isLevelUnlocked(int level)
      Gets whether a specific level is unlocked.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to check (1-6)
      Returns:
      true if the level is unlocked

    • getLevelScores

      public int[] getLevelScores()
      Gets the level scores.
      Returns:
      Array of scores for each level
